title: jingo wild horse of abaco
description: From Kirkus Reviews:Tim and Jenny, two twelve-year-old residents of the Bahamas, find,on the remote island of Abaco, a stallion to intrigue even the most tepid equestrian. Determined to capture and train him, the two children slowly win his trust. But just as they are about to make him officially theirs, the horse is stolen by an unscrupulous opportunist. How Jingo is finally retrieved makes up the main thread of this pleasant story, rich in detail of the Bahamas and horsemanship. By the author of Simba of the White Mane.
author: Jocelyn Arundel
